title: Global Precision Update
changes: Precision Business Identity: Auto-populate and URL-based imports.
Regional Localization: Dynamic locale/timezone adaptation per scan.
Fail-Safe Scans: Automatic proxy blacklisting and direct fallback.
Enhanced Al-Insights: Primary threat identification and market share analysis.
Telemetry Console: Integrated system logs in Settings.

title: Stability Patch
changes: Fixed coordinate validation for equator/prime meridian points.
